actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To establish conditions to be imposed by the Interstate Commerce Commission for the protection of employees in certain rail transactions, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rail Line Preservation and Employee Protection Act

summary.text: Rail Line Preservation and Employee Protection Act - Amends Federal transportation law to direct the Interstate Commerce Commission to impose certain conditions for the protection of employees when approving specified transactions involving the acquisition of a rail line or lines or of rights to operate over a rail line or lines by a noncarrier.

titles.title: Rail Line Preservation and Employee Protection Act
To establish conditions to be imposed by the Interstate Commerce Commission for the protection of employees in certain rail transactions, and for other purposes.
